what file system are you trying to use?: I had problems with Sata and ext3.  Switched to ReiserFS and worked fine.

With dapper there were release notes for the Desktop cd.  After booting the live cd, go to terminal and type (sudo /etc/init.d/mdadm stop) then (sudo mdadm --stop --scan) then (sudo vgchange -a n).  I found this info in teh release notes at http://www.ubuntu.com/download/releasenotes/606
